PageTitle: undo rule description (User ACL group view)
FuncDef: The undo rule description command deletes the description of an ACL rule. The undo rule description command deletes the description of an ACL rule. By default, no description is configured for an ACL rule.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an ACL rule.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967294.

Examples: [*HUAWEI-acl-user-5001] rule 23 description permitting packets in which the four consecutive bytes starting from the fourteenth byte of the Layer 2 header is 0180C200.
ExtraInfo: Run the rule description command to configure a description for an ACL in any of the following situations:
